attributes.action: Suspend sanctions against Iran for the duration of the coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The US administration has already lifted some sanctions and it is the humane thing to do.
attributes.background: As of today, 2,336 cases have now been confirmed in Iran and Iran has a high ratio of deaths to infections – now about 3.3%. Sanctions against Iran should be lifted immediately to help its populace and prevent the global spread of infection.
